```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#### Change to categorical vars ####
data$SID <- factor(data$SID)

data$Validity <- factor(data$Validity)

### Plotting setup #### 
colors = c("#F8A299","#CCCCCC","#98E6A1")

```

# full 
## interaction
```{r full_interaction_acc_Bayes_Factor}
d <- data
bf_full_interaction <- anovaBF(Acc ~ Validity * Target * targetContrast * nontargetContrast + SID, data = data, whichRandom = "SID", progress = FALSE)
print(bf_full_interaction)
```
## main
```{r full_main_acc_Bayes_Factor}
d <- data
bf_full_main <- anovaBF(Acc ~ Validity + Target + targetContrast + nontargetContrast + SID, data = data, whichRandom = "SID", progress = FALSE)
bf_interaction <- bf_full_interaction / bf_full_main
print(bf_interaction)
```

# Target Contrast
## TP 
```{r TP_acc_Bayes_Factor}
d <- data%>% filter(targetContrast==1)
bf_TP <- anovaBF(Acc ~ Validity * Target * targetContrast * nontargetContrast + SID, data = data, whichRandom = "SID", progress = FALSE)
print(bf_TP)
```
## TA
```{r TA_acc_Bayes_Factor}
d <- data%>% filter(targetContrast==0)
bf_TA <- anovaBF(Acc ~ Validity * Target * targetContrast * nontargetContrast + SID, data = data, whichRandom = "SID", progress = FALSE)
print(bf_TA)
```
